name: Chicken Curry
preparation: Cut the chicken into medium-sized pieces and set it aside. Finely chop the onion and garlic. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat and cook the onion and garlic until soft and fragrant. Add the chicken and spices, stirring well so the flavors combine. Pour in a small amount of water and let everything simmer gently until the chicken is fully cooked and the sauce has thickened. Serve warm with cooked rice.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
preparation: Cook the spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Fry the bacon in a pan until crispy. In a bowl, mix the eggs with grated cheese and black pepper. Drain the pasta and combine it immediately with the bacon. Remove from heat and add the egg mixture, stirring quickly to create a creamy sauce. Serve immediately while hot.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
preparation: Wash and cut the vegetables into small pieces. Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat. Add the vegetables and stir continuously so they remain crisp. Pour in the soy sauce and mix well so the vegetables are evenly coated. Serve immediately.

name: Beef Stew
preparation: Cut the beef into large chunks and season lightly. Chop the vegetables into similar-sized pieces. Heat oil in a deep pot and brown the beef on all sides. Add the vegetables and stir briefly. Pour in the broth, cover the pot, and let the stew cook slowly until the meat is tender and the sauce is rich.

name: Caesar Salad
preparation: Wash and dry the lettuce thoroughly and cut it into large pieces. Grill the chicken until golden and slice it. Place the lettuce in a bowl and add the chicken, cheese, and croutons. Add the sauce just before serving and mix gently.

name: Grilled Salmon
preparation: Season the salmon with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Heat a grill or pan and cook the salmon until golden on both sides and tender inside. Serve hot with extra lemon if desired.

name: Tomato Soup
preparation: Chop the onion and garlic and cook them gently in a pot with oil until soft. Add the tomatoes and broth and let everything simmer so the flavors blend. Blend until smooth and serve warm.

name: Pancakes
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a bowl until a smooth batter forms. Heat a pan lightly greased and pour in some batter. Cook until bubbles appear, flip, and cook until golden. Continue until all batter is used.

name: Omelette
preparation: Beat the eggs with salt. Heat oil in a pan and pour in the eggs. Cook gently until set, fold the omelette, and serve warm.

name: Pizza Margherita
preparation: Preheat the oven. Spread tomato sauce over the dough and add cheese. Bake until the crust is crispy and the cheese is melted. Finish with fresh basil before serving.

name: Avocado Toast
preparation: Toast the bread until golden. Mash the avocado with salt and spread it over the toast. Drizzle with olive oil and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Wrap
preparation: Cook the chicken until golden and slice it. Warm the tortilla and fill it with chicken, lettuce, and sauce. Roll tightly and serve.

name: Rice with Vegetables
preparation: Cook the rice until tender. Fry the vegetables in oil until soft. Mix the vegetables with the rice and serve warm.

name: Chicken Pasta
preparation: Cook the pasta until al dente. Cook the chicken in a pan until done. Add cream and cheese to the chicken and stir until creamy. Mix with the pasta and serve.

name: Fruit Salad
preparation: Wash and cut the fruit into small pieces. Place everything in a bowl and mix gently. Serve fresh.

name: Hamburger
preparation: Form a beef patty and cook it on a hot grill or pan until done. Toast the bun lightly and assemble the burger with cheese and vegetables. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Soup
preparation: Bring the broth to a boil. Add the chicken and carrots and cook gently until tender. Serve warm.

name: Fried Rice
preparation: Cook the egg in a pan while stirring. Add the rice and fry briefly. Pour in soy sauce and mix well before serving.

name: Baked Potatoes
preparation: Preheat the oven. Cut the potatoes into pieces and place them on a baking tray. Season with oil and salt and bake until golden and crispy.

name: Tuna Salad
preparation: Drain the tuna well. Chop the vegetables and mix everything in a bowl. Season to taste and serve fresh.

name: French Toast
preparation: Mix the egg and milk in a bowl. Dip the bread slices into the mixture and fry them in a pan until golden on both sides. Serve warm.

name: Chicken Nuggets
preparation: Cut the chicken into small pieces and coat them with breadcrumbs. Fry in hot oil until golden and crispy. Drain and serve.

name: Pasta Salad
preparation: Cook the pasta and let it cool slightly. Chop the tomato and mix it with the pasta and olives. Season with olive oil and serve.

name: Scrambled Eggs
preparation: Beat the eggs lightly. Melt butter in a pan and cook the eggs slowly while stirring until creamy. Serve immediately.

name: Veggie Wrap
preparation: Cook the vegetables lightly. Warm the tortilla and fill it with vegetables and sauce. Roll and serve.

name: Chicken Rice Bowl
preparation: Cook the rice until tender. Cook the chicken and broccoli separately. Combine everything in a bowl and serve warm.

name: Grilled Cheese
preparation: Butter the bread and place cheese between slices. Grill in a pan until the bread is golden and the cheese has melted.

name: Pasta Bolognese
preparation: Cook the meat in a pan until browned. Add tomato sauce and let it simmer. Cook the pasta and mix with the sauce before serving.

name: Chicken Salad
preparation: Cook the chicken and cut it into pieces. Chop the lettuce and mix everything together with sauce. Serve fresh.

name: Smoothie
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Tacos
preparation: Cook the chicken until well done. Warm the tortillas and fill them with chicken and vegetables. Serve hot.

name: Tuna Sandwich
preparation: Mix the tuna with mayonnaise. Spread the mixture on bread and serve.

name: Baked Chicken
preparation: Preheat the oven. Season the chicken well and place it in a baking dish. Bake until golden and fully cooked.

name: Yogurt Bowl
preparation: Place yogurt in a bowl and add fresh fruit on top. Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Soup
preparation: Chop the vegetables and boil them in broth until tender. Serve warm.

name: Chicken Sandwich
preparation: Cook the chicken and toast the bread. Assemble the sandwich with lettuce and chicken and serve.

name: Rice with Egg
preparation: Cook the rice and fry the egg separately. Serve together with tomato sauce.

name: Pasta with Cheese
preparation: Cook the pasta and mix it with cheese until melted. Serve warm.

name: Banana Pancakes
preparation: Mash the banana and mix it with egg and flour. Cook small pancakes in a pan until golden on both sides.

name: Chicken Pasta Salad
preparation: Cook the pasta and chicken separately. Mix them with vegetables and serve chilled or warm.

name: Egg Sandwich
preparation: Fry the egg and toast the bread. Assemble the sandwich and serve.

name: Ham Cheese Sandwich
preparation: Place ham and cheese between slices of bread. Warm the sandwich until the cheese melts slightly.

name: Vegetable Pasta
preparation: Cook the pasta and vegetables separately. Combine them and serve warm.

name: Apple Oatmeal
preparation: Cook the oats with milk until creamy. Add chopped apple and serve warm.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
preparation: Fill the tortilla with chicken and cheese. Grill until the cheese melts and serve hot.

name: Rice Salad
preparation: Cook the rice and let it cool slightly. Add vegetables and mix well. Serve fresh.

name: Chicken with Vegetables
preparation: Cook the chicken until golden, then add vegetables and continue cooking until tender. Serve warm.

name: Toast with Jam
preparation: Toast the bread and spread jam evenly on top. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Soup with Noodles
preparation: Bring the broth to a boil and add chicken and vegetables. Add noodles and cook until tender. Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Omelette
preparation: Beat the eggs and mix them with chopped vegetables. Cook the mixture in a pan until set and lightly golden. Serve warm.
